DOC.brief_summary: An observational study design compare colonic cytokine concentration lean versus obese individual
DOC.brief_title: Effects Weight Inflammation Colon Cancer Risk
DOC.detailed_description: An observational study perform 43 individual undergoing routine screening colonoscopy , lean obese . They weight , height , waist-hip ratio measure time colonoscopy additional colonic biopsy measure colonic cytokine .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Caucasian 2. undergoing clinicallyindicated screen colonoscopy 3 . BMI < = 25 , 30+ 1. past history cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) 2. polyposis syndrome 3. current chronic inflammatory disease infection 4. incapable provide valid informed consent
